text:
Parent to child theme
Is there a way to exclude some parent theme templates from the child.

Would be great to make some parent theme templates unavailable to child.

maybe called “assets inheriting blocker” file

A way to refresh auth via a personal access key in the CLI without routing the user to a page to collect the key. Something like:

`hs auth --account=[account ID] --personal-access-key=[PAK value]`
Could store the acct ID/PAK vals as `NODE_ENV` vars.

OR, because an already initialized `HubSpot.config.yml` would have both the account and PAK, and each portal should have an alias, you could specify the name of the portal you want to refresh and it could do it.
`hs auth --portal=develop`  for another 30 minute access token.
I would suggest cross posting here: <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cli/issues>
Already started playing w/ it a bit. If I can get it working I'll open a PR.
